lead_paragraph: Manager Claudio Ranieri and Leicester City's players and fans may be in hot water following ill-discipline and off-field crowd behaviour during the 10-man champions' remarkable 2-2 fightback at Stoke City on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Leicester May Be in Hot Water With FA After Superb Rally
headline.main: Leicester May Be in Hot Water With FA After Superb Rally

snippet: Manager Claudio Ranieri and Leicester City's players and fans may be in hot water following ill-discipline and off-field crowd behaviour during the 10-man champions' remarkable 2-2 fightback at Stoke City on Saturday....
